0: In 2010, NASA developed and launched satellites based artificially intelligent named H2O Project that would analyse Earth.
1: The studies reported terrible predictions for Mankind.
3: ^750 But Men did nothing to prevent these ravishing prospects ^500 and the most vital resource to life disappeared: clean drinking water (ou water ou bref).
4: Indeed, humans can survive 30 days without eating but only 3 days without drinking.
5: Yet, on Earth, every human being did not have access to clean drinking water.
6: In 2084, mankind among many species vanished off the face of the Earth. ^1000
